items.sentence: The flood water reached the level of the windows.
The heavy snow made them put off their departure.
The hijackers were from Middle Eastern countries.
The man driving the bus is a good friend of mine.
Let\'s sit here for a while and look at the view.
Let\'s wait and see if Tom really needs our help.
Let\'s wrap up this work now and go out drinking.
I\'m pretty certain I haven\'t made any mistakes.
Do you think we\'ll find what we\'re looking for?
A good cook doesn\'t throw out yesterday\'s soup.
I think I\'ve persuaded Tom to donate some money.
I think Tom is from Australia, but I\'m not sure.
I think Tom probably doesn\'t like you very much.
I think it\'s pretty obvious that Tom likes Mary.
I think it\'s time for me to move to the suburbs.
Your poor memory is due to poor listening habits.
Tom listened patiently as the old man rambled on.
Tom lived next door to us until three months ago.
Tom looked at a snowflake through his microscope.
Tom managed to get on the school basketball team.
